Code logic for Uganda employed credit limit calculation

1.Interface requests

Request parameters (Employed)：

FieldDictionary
id_number
id_typeid_number
first_name
last_name
email
phone_number
gendermale female other
date_of_birth
marital_statussingle married divorced
referral_source
country_codeke|null-Kenya,rw-Rwanda,ug-Uganda,ng-Nigeria
employedfalse-SelfEmployed,true-Employed
mpesa_bank_connect
employed_occupational_detailslist
employer
job_function
job_level
job_group
net_income
expenses
employer_sector
payment_type

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether the customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_rejected","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "rejected","approval_type": "auto_rejection","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears","has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determining whether the customer has monthly repayment capacity

Determine if the field net_income of the request less than the field expenses of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_rejected","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "rejected","approval_type": "auto_rejection","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer income is lower than expenses","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determining whether a consumer is employed by a private sector

Field employee_sector must be private_sector. if not, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_inactive","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "pending_approval","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer is employed in public sector","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Determining whether a customer paid via cash or mobile money

Field payment_type must be cash or mobile_money. if not, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_extra_docs","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "pending_approval","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer is not paid via cash or mobile money","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Get Credit Reference Bureau Report

If net_income >=75000 get json_report.

If api_code == ‘E017’ then return this report.

{"credit_score": 0,"ppi_score": 'NR',"accounts_size": 0,"performing_accts": 0,"npa_accounts": 0,"pwd_accounts": 0,"credit_mix": 0,"has_error": false}

If get CRB report has error then return this report.

{"credit_score": 0,"ppi_score": 0,"accounts_size": 0,"performing_accts": 0,"npa_accounts": 0,"pwd_accounts": 0,"credit_mix": 0,"has_error": true}

Others return this report.

{credit_score: crb_data['credit_score'],ppi_score: crb_data['ppi_analysis']['ppi_rank'],accounts_size: account_size,performing_accts: performing_accts.sum,npa_accounts: account_npa.sum,pwd_accounts: pwd_accounts.sum,credit_mix: account_mix}

If net_income < 75000 get delinquency_report.return this report.

{api_code: resp_data['api_code'],api_code_description: resp_data['api_code_description'],delinquency_code: resp_data['delinquency_code'],has_error: resp_data['has_error'],identity_number: @customer_kyc[:id_number],identity_type: '001',loan_amount: 1000}

If get CRB report has error then return this report.

{api_code: '',api_code_description: '',delinquency_code: '001',has_error: true,identity_number: @customer_kyc[:id_number],identity_type: '001',loan_amount: 1000}

3.6 credit worthiness formula

​Calculate (net_income - expenses) * (85/100) and net_income* (15/100) take whichever is the smallest (the underlined value is the default value and can be configured).

3.7 Calculating the credit limit

End the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_inactive","limit_amount": credit_worthiness * multiplier * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER_NIGERIA,"credit_option": "pending_approval","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Limit calculated based on DTIR and CRB","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

Code logic for Nigeria self-employed credit limit calculation

1.Interface requests

Request parameters (Self-Employed)：

FieldDictionary
id_number
id_typeid_number
first_name
last_name
email
phone_number
gendermale female other
date_of_birth
marital_statussingle married divorced
country_codeke||null-Kenya,rw-Rwanda,ug-Uganda,ng-Nigeria
employedfalse-SelfEmployed,true-Employed
self_employed_occupational_detailslist
business_type
business_industry
gross_monthly_revenue
average_monthly_expenses
average_monthly_personal_expense
business_payment_type
business_registered
total_expensesaverage_monthly_expenses+average_monthly_personal_expense

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether a customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears", "has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determine if the business payment type of self-employed is accepted

​Determine if the field business_payment_type of the request is not in ACCEPTED_PAYMENT_TYPES[bank mobile_money], then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed customer payment type is unaccepted", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determining whether the total monthly income of a self-employed business exceeds its total expenses

​Determine if the field total_expenses of the request exceeds the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed customer has no available disposable income", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Get Credit Reference Bureau Report from Allawee

Call Allawee’s interface to pass id_number to get customer_id,then call Allawee’s interface to pass customer_id to get credit_score,if the interface call fails,then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_failed_crb", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Failed CRB report download", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Checks CRB Report

If the field credit_score ==0 or credit_score <= 299 ,then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer does not meet minimum CRB requirements", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.6 credit worthiness formula

​Calculate business_gross_monthly_revenue - total_expenses

3.7 Calculating the credit limit

If credit_score between 701 and 850 , then credit_option = ‘option_1’ and multiplier = 1.0.

If credit_score between 601 and 700 , then credit_option = ‘option_2’ and multiplier = 0.9 .

If credit_score between 501 and 600 , then credit_option = ‘option_3’ and multiplier = 0.75 .

If credit_score between 400 and 500 , then credit_option = ‘option_4’ and multiplier = 0.5 .

Others credit_option = ‘rejected’ and multiplier = 0.0 .

End the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": credit_worthiness * multiplier * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER_NIGERIA, "credit_option": "option_1" or "option_2" or "option_3" or "option_4" or "rejected", "approval_type": "approval_pending", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "client meets the criteria for credit option", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether the customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears", "has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determining whether the customer has monthly repayment capacity

Determine if the field net_income of the request less than the field expenses of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer income is lower than expenses", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determining whether the customer paid via bank

Determine if the field payment_type != ‘bank’, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer is not paid via bank", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Get Credit Reference Bureau Report from Allawee

Call Allawee’s interface to pass id_number to get customer_id,then call Allawee’s interface to pass customer_id to get credit_score,if the interface call fails,then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_failed_crb", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Failed CRB report download", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Checks CRB Report

If the field credit_score ==0 ,then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer has Null or Not Rated CRB report", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

If the field reported_delinquencies >=3 or credit_score < = 500 or npa_accounts > =2,then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Limit rejected based on credit option", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.6 credit worthiness formula

​Calculate (net_income - expenses) * (85/100) and net_income* (15/100) take whichever is the smallest (the underlined value is the default value and can be configured).

3.7 Calculating the credit limit

If npa_accounts == 0 && credit_scorebetween 701 and 850 && credit_mix >= 3 && accounts_size == performing_accts ,then credit_option = ‘option_1’ and multiplier = 1.0.

If npa_accounts == 0 && credit_scorebetween 601 and 700 && credit_mix >= 1 && performing_accts/ accounts_size >= 0.9 , then credit_option = ‘option_2’ and multiplier = 0.9 .

If credit_score> 500 && credit_mix >= 0 &&npa_accounts <=1 && performing_accts/ accounts_size >= 0.75 , then credit_option = ‘option_3’ and multiplier = 0.75 .

Others credit_option = ‘rejected’ and multiplier = 0.0 .

End the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": credit_worthiness * multiplier * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER_NIGERIA, "credit_option": "option_1" or "option_2" or "option_3" or "rejected", "approval_type": "approval_pending", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Limit rejected based on credit option", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

employer

job_level
job_group
net_income

payment_type

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether the customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_rejected","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "rejected","approval_type": "auto_rejection","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears","has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determining whether the customer has monthly repayment capacity

Determine if the field net_income of the request less than the field expenses of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_rejected","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "rejected","approval_type": "auto_rejection","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer income is lower than expenses","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determining whether the customer paid via bank

Determine if the field payment_type != ‘bank’, then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_rejected","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "rejected","approval_type": "auto_rejection","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Customer is not paid via bank","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Get Credit Reference Bureau Report

Obtain customer credit score by name and ID number,if the interface call fails,then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_failed_crb","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "pending_approval","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Failed CRB report download","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Checks CRB Report

If the field response_code ==202 ,then calculate (net_income - expenses) * (85/100) and net_income* (15/100) take whichever is the smallest (the underlined value is the default value and can be configured). End the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_inactive","limit_amount": credit_worthiness * 0.9 * 12 /INTEREST_MULTIPLIER,"credit_option": "option_2","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Auto scored but awaiting bank statements","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

If the field score_band ==“II” or score_band ==“JJ” orcredit_score < = 482 or probability_of_default > =50 or npas > 1,then end the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_failed_crb","limit_amount": 0.0,"credit_option": "pending_approval","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Failed CRB prechecks","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.6 credit worthiness formula

​Calculate (net_income - expenses) * (85/100) and net_income* (15/100) take whichever is the smallest (the underlined value is the default value and can be configured).

3.7 Calculating the credit limit

If credit_score< 561 && probability_of_default < 50 && npas <= 1 ,then credit_option = ‘option_3’ and multiplier = 0.75.

If credit_score< 589 && probability_of_default < 40 && npas == 0 ,then credit_option = ‘option_2’ and multiplier = 0.9.

If credit_score>= 589 && probability_of_default < 20 && npas == 0 ,then credit_option = ‘option_1’ and multiplier = 1.0.

Others credit_option = ‘rejected’ and multiplier = 0.0 .

End the process with the response message.

{"limit_status": "limit_inactive","limit_amount": credit_worthiness * multiplier * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER_NIGERIA,"credit_option": "option_1" or "option_2" or "option_3" or "rejected","approval_type": "","approval_date": null,"limit_description": "Auto scored but awaiting bank statements","has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

Code logic for Kenya self-employed credit limit calculation

1.Interface requests

Request parameters (SelfEmployed)：

FieldDictionary
id_number
id_typeid_number
first_name
last_name
email
phone_number
gendermale female other
date_of_birth
marital_statussingle married divorced
country_codeke||null-Kenya,rw-Rwanda,ug-Uganda,ng-Nigeria
employedfalse-SelfEmployed,true-Employed
self_employed_occupational_detailslist
business_type
business_industry
gross_monthly_revenue
average_monthly_expenses
average_monthly_personal_expense
business_payment_type
business_registered
total_expensesaverage_monthly_expenses+average_monthly_personal_expense

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether a customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears",    "has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determine if the business type of self-employed is accepted

​Determine if the field business_type of the request contains REJECTED_BUSINESS_TYPES [student, freelancer], then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Self employed business industry is unaccepted",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determine if the business payment type of self-employed is accepted

​Determine if the field business_payment_type of the request is not in ACCEPTED_PAYMENT_TYPES[bank mobile_money], then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Self employed customer payment type is unaccepted",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Determining whether the total monthly income of a self-employed business exceeds its total expenses

​Determine if the field total_expenses of the request exceeds the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Self employed customer has no available disposable income",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Determining whether the monthly revenue of a self-employed business meets the threshold

​Determine if the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request Less than 100000, then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Self employed customer does not meet minimum monthly revenue of 100000",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.6 Determining whether the monthly revenue of a self-employed business Less than 75000

​Determine if the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request Less than 75000, then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Limit rejected because business generates less than 75k pm",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.7 Get Report from Credit Reference Bureau

​Get report from Credit Reference Bureau,then save the CRB report to the crb_report_table. if the interface call fails,then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_failed_crb",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "pending_approval",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Failed CRB report download",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 Checks CRB full report

​The requirements to pass is credit_score== 0&&ppi_score==‘NR’ or credit_score> 299 &&npa_accounts<1&&ppi_score<=7&&pwd_accounts<=2. if not,then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Customer does not meet minimum CRB requirements",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

​The requirements to pass is business_gross_monthly_revenue* 6 > 100000 &&business_registered is true && credit_score between 600 and 900 . if not,then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_rejected",    "limit_amount": 0.0,    "credit_option": "rejected",    "approval_type": "auto_rejection",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Limit rejected based on credit option",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.9 Calculating the credit limit

​If ppi_score < 3 && npa_accounts == 0 && pwd_accounts == 0 ,then credit_option = “option_1” and multiplier = 0.05. If ppi_score < 5 && npa_accounts == 0 && pwd_accounts <= 1, then credit_option = “option_2” and multiplier = 0.03.If credit_score == 0 && ppi_score == “NR” , then credit_option = “option_2” and multiplier = 0.03 , others credit_option = “rejected” and multiplier = 0.0, then end the process with the response message.

{    "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs",    "limit_amount": (`business_gross_monthly_revenue`-`total_expenses`) * multiplier * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER,    "credit_option": "option_1" or "option_2" or "rejected",    "approval_type": "approval_pending",    "approval_date": null,    "limit_description": "Limit rejected based on credit option",    "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.10 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

Code logic for Kenya employed credit limit calculation

1.Interface requests

Request parameters (Employed)：

FieldDictionary

id_typeid_number
first_name
last_name
email

gendermale female other

employedfalse-SelfEmployed,true-Employed

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether a customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan debit status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then credit_limit is 0 and credit_option is rejected.

3.2 Get the employment and income of users from National Hospital Insurance Fund for Kenyan users

​First determine whether payment_type payment type is bank, if not, skip the calling; if yes, call NHIF interface to send GET request to obtain NHIF Data by id_number , (here there is the interface response data control, if not in production environment, directly return fixed test_nhif_data), save NHIF Data (if income is less than or equal to 0 in the data, it will be replaced by net_income in the request message for saving) If there is exception during the calling or the NHIF response requires_extra_docs is true, the credit_limit is 0, the credit_option is pending_approval, decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.3 Determining whether a consumer is employed by a private sector

​Field employee_sector must be private_sector. if not, then credit_limit is 0, credit_option is pending_approval, decision_reason is Customer is employed in public sector, decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.4 Determining whether a consumer is a lipavismart customer

​Based on whether the field referral_source is CARREFOUR_REFERRAL_SOURCE which we can get from environments, determine if it is a Carrefour customer. If the referral source is Carrefour, then the credit_limit is 0, the credit_option is pending approval, decision_reason is Customer is Lipavismart, decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.5 Determining if the consumer is older than 22 years old

​If the age is less than 22 years old, the credit_limit is 0, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Customer is below 22 years of age , decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.6 Judging the job_function and job_level of the consumer

​If the job_function is Security or Intern or the job_level is Intern, the credit_limit is 0, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Customer job function is security or job level is intern, decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.7 Customer works in organisation that needs extra documentation

​For employers who work in componies whose name includes ‘epz’, ‘hela’, ‘hela intimates’, then credit_limit is 0, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Customer works in organisation that needs extra documentation, decision is limit_extra_docs.

3.8 Get Report from Credit Reference Bureau

​We send post request for crb_report(here is the interface response data control, if not in production environment, directly return fixed test_nhif_data). if net_income (net income) is greater than or equal to 75000, get json_report (full report) ; below 75000, get delinquency report. if the interface call fails, return an empty report and save the CRB report to the crb_report_table.

​If the interface call fails or if the json_report obtained has an empty credit_score or an empty ppi_score, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Failed CRB report download, decision is limit_extra_docs.

​If delinquency_code in delinquency report is 001 or 002, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Customer has Null or Not Rated CRB report, decision is limit_extra_docs.

​If credit_score in json_report is 0 and ppi_score=‘NR’, the credit_option is pending_approval, the decision_reason is Customer has Null or Not Rated CRB report, decision is limit_extra_docs.

​If the delinquency report has a delinquency_code other than 003 or 005, then credit_option is rejected, the decision_reason is Limit rejected based on credit option, decision is limit_rejected (rejected) . Also, if credit_score>= 400 and npa_accounts=0 and ppi_score][1] <= 6 and pwd_accounts<= 3 in json_report , the credit_option is rejected, the decision_reason is Limit rejected based on credit option, decision is limit_rejected.

4. Calculate Credit Limit through Credit Score

4.1 credit worthiness formula

​If mpesa_bank_connect is not empty or the payment method is not bank, take whichever is the smallest: (net_income - expenses)*(70/100) or net_income * (30/100), otherwise use the income in nhif_data as the net income calculation criteria. If nhif_data is not available, calculate (income - expenses) * (85/100) and income * (15/100) according to net_income, take whichever is the smallest (the underlined value is the default value and can be configured).

4.2 Rules for customers with net_income below 75,000

If the delinquency_code in the delinquency report is 001 002 005, the amount is calculated using CREDIT SCORING OPTION 2 with the formula: credit worthiness *0.9*12/INTEREST_MULTIPLIER ( Interest multiplier, configurable parameter)

​If the delinquency_code in the delinquency report is 003, then the limit is calculated using CREDIT SCORING OPTION 1 with the formula: credit worthiness *1*12/INTEREST_MULTIPLIER MULTIPLIER (interest multiplier, configurable parameter).

4.3 For customers with net_income greater than or equal to 75,000 the credit calculation rules

​If credit_score=0 and ppi_score=‘NR’ in the CRB report, then use CREDIT SCORING OPTION 2 to calculate the credit limit with the formula: credit worthiness *0.9*12/ENV[‘INTEREST_ MULTIPLIER’].

​If the credit_score in the CRB report is between 600-900 and npa_accounts=0 and accounts_size=performing_accts and ppi_score<3 and credit_mix >= 2, then Use CREDIT SCORING OPTION 1 to calculate the credit limit with the formula: credit worthiness (credit score)*1*12/ENV[‘INTEREST_MULTIPLIER’].

​If the credit_score in the CRB report is between 600-900 and npa_accounts = 0 and ppi_score <= 4 and credit_mix >= 1 and pwd_accounts <= 1, then use CREDIT SCORING OPTION 2 to calculate the credit limit with the formula: credit worthiness *0.9*12/ENV[‘INTEREST_MULTIPLIER’].

​If the credit_score in the CRB report is between 400-600, and the ppi_score <= 6, and npa_accounts = 0, and performing_accts/accounts_size >= 0.75, and pwd_accounts <= 3, and credit worthiness accounts<= 3 and credit_mix>= 1, then use CREDIT SCORING OPTION 3 to calculate the credit limit with the formula: credit worthiness *0.75*12/ENV[‘INTEREST_MULTIPLIER’].

​If the credit_score in the CRB report is between 200 and 400, and the ppi_score <= 9, and npa_accounts <= 1, and performing_accts/accounts_size >= 0.5, and npa_accounts/accounts_size accounts/accounts_size <= 0.25, and pwd_accounts/accounts_size <= 0.25, and credit_mix>= 1, then use CREDIT SCORING OPTION 4 to calculate the credit limit with the formula: credit worthiness (credit score)*0.5*12/ENV[‘INTEREST_MULTIPLIER’].

​For other cases, refuse.

5.The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value

Code logic for Uganda self-employed credit limit calculation

1.Interface requests

Request parameters (Self-Employed)：

FieldDictionary
id_number
id_typeid_number
first_name
last_name
email
phone_number
gendermale female other
date_of_birth
marital_statussingle married divorced
country_codeke||null-Kenya,rw-Rwanda,ug-Uganda,ng-Nigeria
employedfalse-SelfEmployed,true-Employed
self_employed_occupational_detailslist
business_type
business_industry
gross_monthly_revenue
average_monthly_expenses
average_monthly_personal_expense
business_payment_type
business_registered
total_expensesaverage_monthly_expenses+average_monthly_personal_expense

2.Determine if the interface request data is empty

3.Calculating the credit limit

3.1 Determining whether a customer is an overdue user of lipa later

​Check the MusoniLoan loan status by id_number and phone_number. if loan_status=Closed (written off) or in_arrears=true, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Customer has lipalater loans in arrears", "has_lipalater_arrears": true}

3.2 Determine if the business type of self-employed is accepted

​Determine if the field business_type of the request contains REJECTED_BUSINESS_TYPES [student, freelancer], then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed business industry is unaccepted", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.3 Determining whether the total monthly income of a self-employed business exceeds its total expenses

​Determine if the field total_expenses of the request exceeds the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed customer has no available disposable income", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.4 Determining whether the monthly revenue of a self-employed business meets the threshold

​Determine if the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request Less than 100000, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed customer does not meet minimum monthly revenue of 100000", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.5 Determine if the business payment type of self-employed is accepted

​Determine if the field business_payment_type of the request is not in ACCEPTED_PAYMENT_TYPES[bank mobile_money], then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_extra_docs", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Self employed customer paid using cash or mobile money", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.6 Determining whether the monthly revenue of a self-employed business Less than 75000

​Determine if the field business_gross_monthly_revenue of the request Less than 75000, then end the process with the response message.

{ "limit_status": "limit_rejected", "limit_amount": 0.0, "credit_option": "rejected", "approval_type": "auto_rejection", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "Limit rejected because business generates less than 75k pm", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.7 Calculating the credit limit

​credit_limit = (business_gross_monthly_revenue-total_expenses) * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER

{ "limit_status": "limit_inactive", "limit_amount": (`business_gross_monthly_revenue`-`total_expenses`) * 12 / INTEREST_MULTIPLIER, "credit_option": "pending_approval", "approval_type": "approval_pending", "approval_date": null, "limit_description": "client meets the criteria for pending_approval", "has_lipalater_arrears": false}

3.8 The credit limit is rounded to the nearest 1000 and compared with the limit to the smallest value（5000000）

entry.title: hexo添加支持emoji
entry.content:
hexo添加支持emoji

很简单，换一个 markdown 引擎，然后再增加 emoji 插件即可。

$ npm un hexo-renderer-marked --save$ npm i hexo-renderer-markdown-it --save $ npm install markdown-it-emoji --save

然后编辑 _config.yml：

markdown:preset: 'default'render:  html: true  xhtmlOut: false  langPrefix: 'language-'  breaks: true  linkify: true  typographer: true  quotes: '“”‘’'enable_rules:disable_rules:plugins:  - markdown-it-footnote  - markdown-it-sup  - markdown-it-sub  - markdown-it-abbr  - markdown-it-emojianchors:  level: 2  collisionSuffix: ''  permalink: false  permalinkClass: 'header-anchor'  permalinkSide: 'left'  permalinkSymbol: '¶'  case: 0  separator: '-'

使用方法在Emoji 中找到你想要的表情，然后点击即可复制。
比如你想发一个笑脸 😄 直接输入笑脸对应的 emoji 编码就可以。

entry.title: WSL常用命令
entry.content:
WSL常用命令

查看所有已经安装的分发版本：

wsl --list --all

查看正在运行的分发版本：

wsl --list --running

删除指定的分发版本：

wsl --unregister <DistributionName>

entry.title: 微信支付代码
entry.content: package com.qujie.mintwo.system.wechatpay;import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSON;import com.qujie.mintwo.config.WechatConfig;import com.wechat.pay.contrib.apache.httpclient.Validator;import com.wechat.pay.contrib.apache.httpclient.WechatPayHttpClientBuilder;import com.wechat.pay.contrib.apache.httpclient.auth.*;import com.wechat.pay.contrib.apache.httpclient.util.AesUtil;import com.wechat.pay.contrib.apache.httpclient.util.PemUtil;import org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse;import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpGet;import org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest;import org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient;import org.apache.http.util.EntityUtils;import org.slf4j.Logger;import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;import javax.annotation.Resource;import java.io.*;import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;import java.security.GeneralSecurityException;import java.security.PrivateKey;import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;import java.util.ArrayList;import java.util.Comparator;import java.util.List;import static org.apache.http.HttpHeaders.ACCEPT;import static org.apache.http.HttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE;import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_OK;import static org.apache.http.entity.ContentType.APPLICATION_JSON;/** * @author 夏天 * @version 1.0 * @date 2021/11/24 */@Componentpublic class WechatPayApiUtil {    private  final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(WechatPayApiUtil.class);    /**     * 参数配置     */    @Resource    private WechatConfig wechatConfig;    public CloseableHttpResponse v3Execution(HttpUriRequest request) throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException {        request.addHeader(CONTENT_TYPE, APPLICATION_JSON.toString());        request.addHeader(ACCEPT, APPLICATION_JSON.toString());        FileInputStream privateKey;        try {            privateKey = new FileInputStream("D:\\apiClient_key.pem");        }catch (FileNotFoundException e){            logger.error("微信支付接口调用所需的私钥文件不存在,路径【{}】",wechatConfig.getPrivateKeyPath());            throw new FileNotFoundException("微信支付接口调用所需的私钥文件不存在");        }        PrivateKey merChantPrivateKey = PemUtil.loadPrivateKey(privateKey);        List<X509Certificate> certs = new ArrayList<>();        try {            FileInputStream certKey = new FileInputStream("D:\\api\\apiClient_cert.pem");            certs.add(PemUtil.loadCertificate(certKey));        }catch (FileNotFoundException e){            logger.error("微信支付接口调用所需的平台证书文件不存在,路径【{}】",wechatConfig.getCertKeyPath());            certs = downloadCertificate();        }        AutoUpdateCertificatesVerifier verifier = new AutoUpdateCertificatesVerifier(                new WechatPay2Credentials(wechatConfig.getMerchantId(), new PrivateKeySigner(wechatConfig.getSerialNumber(), merChantPrivateKey)),                wechatConfig.getApiKey().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));        WechatPayHttpClientBuilder builder = WechatPayHttpClientBuilder.create()                .withMerchant(wechatConfig.getMerchantId(),wechatConfig.getSerialNumber(),merChantPrivateKey).withValidator(new WechatPay2Validator(verifier));        try (CloseableHttpClient client = builder.build()) {            CloseableHttpResponse response = client.execute(request);            int statusCode = response.getStatusLine().getStatusCode();            String body = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity());            if (SC_OK == statusCode) {                logger.info("微信支付商家平台接口调用成功,接口响应信息：【{}】",body);                if(validate(response,certs)){                    logger.info("微信支付商家平台响应信息验证签名成功");                    return response;                }else {                    logger.error("微信支付商家平台响应信息验证签名失败");                    throw new IOException("微信支付商家平台响应信息验证签名失败");                }            }else {                logger.error("微信支付商家平台接口调用失败,错误码【{}】,错误信息【{}】",statusCode,body);                return response;            }        }    }    private boolean validate(CloseableHttpResponse response,List<X509Certificate> x509Certs) throws IOException {        //从下载的证书中，获取对报文签名的私钥所对应的证书，并进行验签来验证证书准确        Verifier verifier = new CertificatesVerifier(x509Certs);        Validator validator = new WechatPay2Validator(verifier);        return  validator.validate(response);    }    public List<X509Certificate> downloadCertificate() throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException {        FileInputStream privateKey;        try {            privateKey = new FileInputStream("D:\\apiClient_key.pem");        }catch (FileNotFoundException e){            logger.error("微信支付接口调用所需的私钥文件路径【{}】不存在",wechatConfig.getPrivateKeyPath());            throw new FileNotFoundException("微信支付接口调用所需的私钥文件不存在");        }        PrivateKey merChantPrivateKey = PemUtil.loadPrivateKey(privateKey);        WechatPayHttpClientBuilder builder = WechatPayHttpClientBuilder.create()                .withMerchant(wechatConfig.getMerchantId(),wechatConfig.getSerialNumber(),merChantPrivateKey).withValidator(response -> true);        HttpGet httpGet = new HttpGet("https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com/v3/certificates");        httpGet.addHeader(ACCEPT, APPLICATION_JSON.toString());        try (CloseableHttpClient client = builder.build()) {            CloseableHttpResponse response = client.execute(httpGet);            int statusCode = response.getStatusLine().getStatusCode();            String body = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity());            if (SC_OK != statusCode) {                logger.error("微信支付商家平台接口调用失败,接口响应码：【{}】,接口响应信息：【{}】",statusCode,body);                throw new IOException("微信支付商家平台接口调用失败");            }            logger.info("微信支付平台证书获取成功,接口响应信息：【{}】",body);            CertificateList certList = JSON.parseObject(body, CertificateList.class);            List<X509Certificate> x509Certs = new ArrayList<>();            AesUtil aesUtil = new AesUtil(wechatConfig.getApiKey().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));            CertificateItem certificateItem = certList.getCerts().stream().max(Comparator.comparing(CertificateItem::getExpireTime)).orElse(null);            if(certificateItem == null){                logger.error("微信支付获取平台证书接口响应信息获取证书为空");                throw new IOException("微信支付获取平台证书接口响应信息获取证书为空");            }            String plainCertificate = aesUtil.decryptToString(certificateItem.getEncryptCertificate().getAssociatedData().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8),                    certificateItem.getEncryptCertificate().getNonce().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8),                    certificateItem.getEncryptCertificate().getCiphertext());            ByteArrayInputStream inputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(plainCertificate.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));            X509Certificate x509Cert = PemUtil.loadCertificate(inputStream);            x509Certs.add(x509Cert);            //从下载的证书中，获取对报文签名的私钥所对应的证书，并进行验签来验证证书准确            boolean isCorrectCert = validate(response,x509Certs);            logger.info(isCorrectCert ? "=== validate success ===" : "=== validate failed ===");            if(!isCorrectCert){                logger.error("微信支付平台证书响应结果验证失败");                throw new IOException("微信支付平台证书响应结果验证失败");            }            File file = new File("D:\\api");            if(!file.exists()){                boolean result = file.mkdirs();                logger.info("目录【{}】不存在需要创建目录，创建结果：【{}】",file.getAbsolutePath(),result);            }            String outputAbsoluteFilename = file.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "apiClient_cert.pem";            try (BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(                    new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(outputAbsoluteFilename), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))) {                writer.write(plainCertificate);            }            logger.info("save cert file absolute path {} " , outputAbsoluteFilename);            return x509Certs;        }    }}

entry.title: Postman汉化

Postman汉化

进入[Github下载页面](Releases · hlmd/Postman-cn (github.com))下载对应版本的 app.zip，进入Postman安装地址/版本/resources目录，
